text: The 2015 Tour de Taiwan is the seventh edition of the Tour de Taiwan cycling stage race. It started on 22 March and ended on 26 March. The race included five stages and was rated as a 2.1 event on the 2015 UCI Asia Tour. The 2014 champion was Rémy Di Gregorio (), but his team was not selected to take part in the 2015 edition. The race was won by unrepentant doper Samad Pourseyedi (). He finished third on the first hill-top finish on stage 2, then took a solo victory on stage 4. He defended his lead to the end of the race. The final podium was made up entirely of Iranian riders: two riders came second and third, Hossein Askari and Rahim Emami. Pourseyedi also won the mountains classification, while were the best team. The points competition was won by Patrick Bevin (), who won one stage, was in the top ten in four stages and was fourth overall in the race. Two stages were won by Wouter Wippert () and one by Tino Thömel (). == Teams == == Stages == === Stage 1 === ; 22 March 2015 – Taiwan – Taiwan, {| || || |} === Stage 2 === ; 22 March 2015 – Taoyuan County – Taoyuan County, {| || || |} === Stage 3 === ; 24 March 2015 – Changhua County—Changhua County () {| || || |} === Stage 4 === ; 25 March 2015 – Sun Moon Lake—Tataka () {| |- || || |} === Stage 5 === ; 26 March 2015 – Jianshanpi Resort—Dapang Bay () {| |- || || |} == References == == External links == * Category:Tour de Taiwan Tour de Taiwan Tour de Taiwan
title: 2015 Tour de Taiwan
